SAINT.Name: Venerable Simeon Stylites (the Younger) of Wonderful Mountain (+596)
Venerable Nikita the Stylite, Wonderworker of Pereyaslavl' Zalesskiy (+1186)
Holy Martyrs Meletius the General, Stephen, John, Serapion the Egyptian, Callinicus the Sorcerer, Theodore and Faustus and with them 1218 Soldiers with their women and children (+ c.218)
Venerable Martha, Abbess of Monemvasia and three nuns with her (+990)
